profile.name: Tzivi
profile.title: React developer. Student at Platzi. Frontend technologies. Critical thinking. Focused on a performant user experience.
profile.description: I'm React Developer with a passion for creating performant user experiences. With experience in backend development, unit and E2E testing, and manual testing, I collaborate with frontend teams to develop features for the project's API. My technical skills include Docker, React, Node, CSS, Bash, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Let's connect and collaborate on creating engaging and performant web applications!

location.notes: Autocompleted using Google Maps API (id: ChIJvQz5TjvKvJURh47oiC6Bs6A)

challenges.description:
## Work Experience
- **Position:** React/Node Developer

## Responsibilities
- **Backend development:** Worked on unit and E2E testing
- **API development:** Collaborated with the front-end team to develop features for the project's API
- **Manual testing:** Manually tested the application to improve user experience and detect performance and accessibility issues

## Accomplishments
- **Improved efficiency:** Detected and addressed performance issues that led to a more efficient application
- **Enhanced accessibility:** Detected and addressed accessibility issues that improved the user's confidence in the product.

institution.name: EF Standard English Test (EF SET)
institution.description: The achieved English level is 75/100 on the EF SET score scale and C2 Proficient according to the Common European Framework of Reference (CEFR). The EF SET score is calculated as an average of the reading and listening scores.

institution.description: I'm a graduated high school electronic technician. I've gathered knowledge in the tech field from the age of 14, having created relatively complex electronics circuits with programmable and non-programmable chips.

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription: I'd love to work in a place where I'm constantly challenged and able to learn new skills. A job where I'm able to make a positive impact on the world and the people around me would be ideal. A good work-life balance is also important to me, as well as a supportive and collaborative team environment. Additionally, the opportunity for growth and advancement within the company would be a plus.

- I organize my work in the most efficient way possible
- I value punctuality and make it a priority to be on time
